name: David LUSICK, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Lusick v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: David LUSICK, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of April, 2006, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

897 A.2d 1165
David LUSICK, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
